Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.1 Paṭiccavāra
10.6.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
200.
2804Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava…pe…  purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca…pe…  jhāne nava, magge tīṇi…pe…  avigate nava.
